query:
SELECT 'planes_sustitucion' as tabla, COUNT(*) as cantidad FROM planes_sustitucion WHERE colaborador LIKE '%ROQUE%'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'planes_sucesion' as tabla, COUNT(*) as cantidad FROM planes_sucesion WHERE colaborador LIKE '%ROQUE%'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'empleados' as tabla, COUNT(*) as cantidad FROM empleados WHERE nombre LIKE '%ROQUE%';

UNION ALL

UNION ALL
SELECT 'empleados' as tabla, COUNT(*) as cantidad FROM empleados WHERE nombre LIKE '%ROQUE%';
